subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jason Terry had 29 points and 15 assists last night, and the Dallas Mavericks established a team record with their 15th consecutive victory by defeating the Orlando Magic, 103-98.
snippet: Jason Terry had 29 points and 15 assists last night, and the Dallas Mavericks established a team record with their 15th consecutive victory by defeating the Orlando Magic, 103-98.
